name: An exquisite platinum ring with sapphires
data: It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'adaption of balance'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'adaption of order'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
